meanings.definition: The act of playing back a recording or performance.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed watching the playbacks of our school play.
meanings.sent2: The technician saved the playbacks of the concert for future reference.
meanings.sent3: The playbacks of the comedy show made everyone laugh again.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a series of playbacks, each moment replaying in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The playbacks of the music video were crystal clear, capturing every detail.

meanings.definition: A recording that is played back.
meanings.sent1: The playbacks of the interview revealed important details.
meanings.sent2: He always double-checks the playbacks of his voice recordings.
meanings.sent3: The playbacks of the baby's first words were heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The playbacks of the old radio show brought back nostalgic memories.
meanings.sent5: The playbacks of the wildlife documentary were fascinating to watch.

meanings.definition: The process of playing back a video or audio recording.
meanings.sent1: The playbacks of the security footage helped solve the mystery.
meanings.sent2: She studied the playbacks of the dance routine to improve her performance.
meanings.sent3: The playbacks of the podcast were accidentally set to double speed.
meanings.sent4: The playbacks of the live stream froze at the most crucial moment.
meanings.sent5: The playbacks of the webinar were clear and easy to follow.
